Sector.Name: Hinterworlds
Sector.Credits: Hinterworlds sector was designed by Marc W. Miller and appears in Atlas of the Imperium (GDW, 1984). It was refined by Rob Caswell and Karl Johnson and appears in Challenge Magazine. Hinterworlds sector 1248 borders designed by Shane MacLean, Eric Oâ€™Dell and Michael Taylor and appears in 1248 Sourcebook 1: Out of Darkness(ComStar Media/Avenger Enterprises, 2006).
